name: Qbit
title: Enterprise Quantum Solutions
description: We help enterprises navigate quantum's realities — not the hype. Our approach is evidence-based, vendor-neutral, and focused on near-term business impact.
mission: Enable responsible, evidence-based quantum adoption for enterprises.
philosophy: Vendor-neutral, honest, and focused on real business outcomes.
commitment: No hype, no exaggeration — just practical quantum solutions.

values.title: Evidence-Based
values.description: Every recommendation backed by data and rigorous analysis.

values.title: Vendor-Neutral
values.description: We work with all major quantum platforms — no conflicts of interest.

values.title: Honest
values.description: We tell you what quantum can and cannot do today.

values.title: Collaborative
values.description: We work alongside your team, building internal capabilities.
